data.textUthmani: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
data.wordByWord: هَلْ [Has] أَتَىٰ [(there) come] عَلَى [upon] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ [man] حِينٌۭ [a period] مِّنَ [of] ٱلدَّهْرِ [time] لَمْ [not] يَكُن [he was] شَيْـًۭٔا [a thing] مَّذْكُورًا [mentioned]
data.transliteration: Hal ata AAala al-insani heenunmina addahri lam yakun shay-an mathkoora

data.textUthmani: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] خَلَقْنَا [[We] created] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ [man] مِن [from] نُّطْفَةٍ [a semen-drop] أَمْشَاجٍۢ [a mixture] نَّبْتَلِيهِ [(that) We test him] فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ [so We made (for) him] سَمِيعًۢا [hearing] بَصِيرًا [and sight]
data.transliteration: Inna khalaqna al-insanamin nutfatin amshajin nabtaleehi fajaAAalnahusameeAAan baseera

data.textUthmani: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] هَدَيْنَـٰهُ [guided him] ٱلسَّبِيلَ [(to) the way] إِمَّا [whether] شَاكِرًۭا [(he) be grateful] وَإِمَّا [and whether] كَفُورًا [(he) be ungrateful]
data.transliteration: Inna hadaynahu assabeelaimma shakiran wa-imma kafoora

data.textUthmani: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّآ [Indeed, We] أَعْتَدْنَا [[We] have prepared] لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [for the disbelievers] سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ [chains] وَأَغْلَـٰلًۭا [and shackles] وَسَعِيرًا [and a Blazing Fire]
data.transliteration: Inna aAAtadna lilkafireenasalasila waaghlalan wasaAAeera

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلْأَبْرَارَ [the righteous] يَشْرَبُونَ [will drink] مِن [from] كَأْسٍۢ [a cup] كَانَ [is] مِزَاجُهَا [its mixture] كَافُورًا [(of) Kafur]
data.transliteration: Inna al-abrara yashraboona min ka/sinkana mizajuha kafoora

data.textUthmani: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
data.wordByWord: عَيْنًۭا [A spring ] يَشْرَبُ [will drink] بِهَا [from it] عِبَادُ [(the) slaves] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] يُفَجِّرُونَهَا [causing it to gush forth] تَفْجِيرًۭا [abundantly]
data.transliteration: AAaynan yashrabu biha AAibaduAllahi yufajjiroonaha tafjeera

data.textUthmani: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
data.wordByWord: يُوفُونَ [They fulfill] بِٱلنَّذْرِ [the vows] وَيَخَافُونَ [and fear] يَوْمًۭا [a Day ] كَانَ [(which) is] شَرُّهُۥ [its evil] مُسْتَطِيرًۭا [widespread]
data.transliteration: Yoofoona binnathri wayakhafoonayawman kana sharruhu mustateera

data.textUthmani: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
data.wordByWord: وَيُطْعِمُونَ [And they feed] ٱلطَّعَامَ [the food] عَلَىٰ [in spite of] حُبِّهِۦ [love (for) it] مِسْكِينًۭا [(to the) needy] وَيَتِيمًۭا [and (the) orphan] وَأَسِيرًا [and (the) captive]
data.transliteration: WayutAAimona attaAAamaAAala hubbihi miskeenan wayateeman waaseera

data.textUthmani: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّمَا [Only] نُطْعِمُكُمْ [we feed you] لِوَجْهِ [for (the) Countenance] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] لَا [Not] نُرِيدُ [we desire] مِنكُمْ [from you] جَزَآءًۭ [any reward] وَلَا [and not] شُكُورًا [thanks]
data.transliteration: Innama nutAAimukum liwajhi Allahila nureedu minkum jazaan wala shukoora

data.textUthmani: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, we] نَخَافُ [fear] مِن [from] رَّبِّنَا [our Lord] يَوْمًا [a Day ] عَبُوسًۭا [harsh] قَمْطَرِيرًۭا [and distressful]
data.transliteration: Inna nakhafu min rabbinayawman AAaboosan qamtareera

data.textUthmani: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
data.wordByWord: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ [But will protect them] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] شَرَّ [(from the) evil] ذَٰلِكَ [(of) that] ٱلْيَوْمِ [Day] وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ [and will cause them to meet] نَضْرَةًۭ [radiance] وَسُرُورًۭا [and happiness]
data.transliteration: Fawaqahumu Allahu sharra thalikaalyawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasuroora

words.translation: and will cause them to meet

data.textUthmani: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
data.wordByWord: وَجَزَىٰهُم [And will reward them] بِمَا [because] صَبَرُوا۟ [they were patient] جَنَّةًۭ [(with) a Garden] وَحَرِيرًۭا [and silk]
data.transliteration: Wajazahum bima sabaroojannatan wahareera

data.textUthmani: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
data.wordByWord: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ [Reclining] فِيهَا [therein] عَلَى [on] ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ [couches] لَا [Not] يَرَوْنَ [they will see] فِيهَا [therein] شَمْسًۭا [sun] وَلَا [and not] زَمْهَرِيرًۭا [freezing cold]
data.transliteration: Muttaki-eena feeha AAala al-ara-ikila yarawna feeha shamsan wala zamhareera

data.textUthmani: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
data.wordByWord: وَدَانِيَةً [And near] عَلَيْهِمْ [above them] ظِلَـٰلُهَا [(are) its shades] وَذُلِّلَتْ [and will hang low] قُطُوفُهَا [its cluster of fruits] تَذْلِيلًۭا [dangling low]
data.transliteration: Wadaniyatan AAalayhim thilaluhawathullilat qutoofuha tathleela

data.textUthmani: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
data.wordByWord: وَيُطَافُ [And will be circulated] عَلَيْهِم [among them] بِـَٔانِيَةٍۢ [vessels] مِّن [of] فِضَّةٍۢ [silver] وَأَكْوَابٍۢ [and cups] كَانَتْ [(that) are] قَوَارِيرَا۠ [(of) crystal]
data.transliteration: Wayutafu AAalayhim bi-aniyatinmin fiddatin waakwabin kanat qawareera

data.textUthmani: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
data.wordByWord: قَوَارِيرَا۟ [Crystal-clear] مِن [of] فِضَّةٍۢ [silver] قَدَّرُوهَا [They will determine its] تَقْدِيرًۭا [measure]
data.transliteration: Qawareera min fiddatinqaddarooha taqdeera

data.textUthmani: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
data.wordByWord: وَيُسْقَوْنَ [And they will be given to drink] فِيهَا [therein] كَأْسًۭا [a cup ] كَانَ [is] مِزَاجُهَا [its mixture] زَنجَبِيلًا [(of) Zanjabil]
data.transliteration: Wayusqawna feeha ka/san kanamizajuha zanjabeela

words.translation: And they will be given to drink

data.textUthmani: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
data.wordByWord: عَيْنًۭا [A spring] فِيهَا [therein] تُسَمَّىٰ [named] سَلْسَبِيلًۭا [Salsabil]
data.transliteration: AAaynan feeha tusammasalsabeela

data.textUthmani: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
data.wordByWord: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ [And will circulate] عَلَيْهِمْ [among them] وِلْدَٰنٌۭ [young boys] مُّخَلَّدُونَ [made eternal] إِذَا [When] رَأَيْتَهُمْ [you see them] حَسِبْتَهُمْ [you would think them] لُؤْلُؤًۭا [(to be) pearls] مَّنثُورًۭا [scattered]
data.transliteration: Wayatoofu AAalayhim wildanunmukhalladoona itha raaytahum hasibtahum lu/lu-anmanthoora

data.textUthmani: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
data.wordByWord: وَإِذَا [And when] رَأَيْتَ [you look] ثَمَّ [then] رَأَيْتَ [you will see] نَعِيمًۭا [blessings] وَمُلْكًۭا [and a kingdom] كَبِيرًا [great]
data.transliteration: Wa-itha raayta thamma raaytanaAAeeman wamulkan kabeera

data.textUthmani: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
data.wordByWord: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ [Upon them] ثِيَابُ [(will be) garments] سُندُسٍ [(of) fine silk] خُضْرٌۭ [green] وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌۭ ۖ [and heavy brocade] وَحُلُّوٓا۟ [And they will be adorned] أَسَاوِرَ [(with) bracelets] مِن [of] فِضَّةٍۢ [silver] وَسَقَىٰهُمْ [and will give them to drink] رَبُّهُمْ [their Lord] شَرَابًۭا [a drink] طَهُورًا [pure]
data.transliteration: AAaliyahum thiyabu sundusinkhudrun wa-istabraqun wahulloo asawira minfiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahoora

words.translation: and will give them to drink

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] كَانَ [is] لَكُمْ [for you] جَزَآءًۭ [a reward] وَكَانَ [and has been] سَعْيُكُم [your effort] مَّشْكُورًا [appreciated]
data.transliteration: Inna hatha kana lakum jazaanwakana saAAyukum mashkoora

data.textUthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] نَحْنُ [[We]] نَزَّلْنَا [[We] revealed] عَلَيْكَ [to you] ٱلْقُرْءَانَ [the Quran] تَنزِيلًۭا [progressively]
data.transliteration: Inna nahnu nazzalnaAAalayka alqur-ana tanzeela

data.textUthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
data.wordByWord: فَٱصْبِرْ [So be patient] لِحُكْمِ [for (the) Command] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] وَلَا [and (do) not] تُطِعْ [obey] مِنْهُمْ [from them] ءَاثِمًا [any sinner] أَوْ [or] كَفُورًۭا [disbeliever]
data.transliteration: Fasbir lihukmi rabbikawala tutiAA minhum athiman aw kafoora

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرِ [And remember] ٱسْمَ [(the) name] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] بُكْرَةًۭ [morning] وَأَصِيلًۭا [and evening]
data.transliteration: Wathkuri isma rabbikabukratan waaseela

data.textUthmani: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
data.wordByWord: وَمِنَ [And of] ٱلَّيْلِ [the night] فَٱسْجُدْ [prostrate] لَهُۥ [to Him] وَسَبِّحْهُ [and glorify Him] لَيْلًۭا [a night] طَوِيلًا [long]
data.transliteration: Wamina allayli fasjud lahu wasabbihhulaylan taweela

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ [these] يُحِبُّونَ [love] ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ [the immediate] وَيَذَرُونَ [and leave] وَرَآءَهُمْ [behind them] يَوْمًۭا [a Day] ثَقِيلًۭا [grave]
data.transliteration: Inna haola-i yuhibboonaalAAajilata wayatharoona waraahum yawmanthaqeela

data.textUthmani: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
data.wordByWord: نَّحْنُ [We] خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ [created them] وَشَدَدْنَآ [and We strengthened] أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ [their forms] وَإِذَا [and when] شِئْنَا [We will] بَدَّلْنَآ [We can change] أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ [their likeness[es]] تَبْدِيلًا [(with) a change]
data.transliteration: Nahnu khalaqnahum washadadnaasrahum wa-itha shi/na baddalna amthalahumtabdeela

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذِهِۦ [this] تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ [(is) a reminder] فَمَن [so whoever] شَآءَ [wills] ٱتَّخَذَ [let him take] إِلَىٰ [to] رَبِّهِۦ [his Lord] سَبِيلًۭا [a way]
data.transliteration: Inna hathihi tathkiratun famanshaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeela

data.textUthmani: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] تَشَآءُونَ [you will] إِلَّآ [except] أَن [that] يَشَآءَ [wills] ٱللَّهُ ۚ [Allah] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] كَانَ [is] عَلِيمًا [All-Knower] حَكِيمًۭا [All-Wise]
data.transliteration: Wama tashaoona illa anyashaa Allahu inna Allaha kanaAAaleeman hakeema

data.textUthmani: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
data.wordByWord: يُدْخِلُ [He admits] مَن [whom] يَشَآءُ [He wills] فِى [into] رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ [His mercy] وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [but (for) the wrongdoers] أَعَدَّ [He has prepared] لَهُمْ [for them] عَذَابًا [a punishment] أَلِيمًۢا [painful]
data.transliteration: Yudkhilu man yashao fee rahmatihiwaththalimeena aAAadda lahum AAathabanaleema
